features: PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: Our disposable face masks are MADE and ASSEMBLED in Grover, NC by EcoGuard Inc., which is a seasoned and experienced United States company has more than 10-year experience in the industry.
FOUR LAYER PROTECTION: This product is made with four layer of non-woven fabrics. One more layer means better performance and better protection.
GENUINENESS GUARANTEED: EcoGuard disposable face mask has enrolled the Transparency Program. There is an exclusive security code on every box. You can verify it by scanning this code.
STEALTH BLACK: Face masks have been a part of our life. The black mask can help you get rid of the dull blue, and becoming a lifestyle.

BREATHABLE AND COMFORTABLE: The inner layer fabrics can effectively wick away the moisture and reduces the fogging on the glasses. Soft and elastic earloop ensure a comfortable fit for most of people. Improved welding on the earloops makes it not easy to break.

DISCLAIMER: THE PRODUCT IS PRIMARILY INTENDED AS A MEANS OF SOURCE CONTROL FOR MINIMIZING THE PROJECTION OF EXPELLED MATERIALS FROM THE WEARER'S NOSE AND MOUTH. THE PRODUCT IS NOT A MEDICAL FACE MASK; IS NOT INTENDED FOR USE IN MEDICAL PROCEDURES, AND IS NOT A RESPIRATOR.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Black Disposable Face Masks EcoGuard 4-Ply ASTM Level 3 Masks

Reliable Black Disposable Face Masks Proudly Made in USA EcoGuard disposable face masks are made in Grover, NC. The nonwoven fabric is also manufactured in the same facility where the face masks are produced.The outside of the face mask will have a “Made in the USA” stamp Reliable Masks Level 3 masks verified by Nelson Labs.EcoGuard disposable face mask has enrolled Transparency Program. You may scan the QR code with Transparency App to verify it.We are glad to do any possible to provide you with greater confidence in reliability.

Adult Masks Color: Black, 4-plyDimension: 6.9 x 3.7 inEarloop Length: 6.3 inPacking: 50pcs/box, Ziploc bag Comfortable The soft and elastic earloop fits over the ears very comfortably and ensures a snug fit and seal for most adults. Adjustable With the adjustable nose wire, it is easy to secure the mask to your face. Extra Protection Well protected against moisture and prolonged exposure to the air by a resealable Ziploc bagThe added shrink wrapping ensures clean and safe masks

4 Layers of Safeguarding Made of four layers of high-quality non-woven fabrics and have good filtration to provide an added level of protection, Your new go-to masks!With the right thickness, our masks can effectively keep dry during 4-hour use. Get a mask that can easily breathe in and does not make your glasses fog up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item as described!
reviews.reviewText: I used to order directly from eco guard which is no longer an option. Was hesitant to order from Amazon due to negative reviews on masks. I took a chance with this product and was very satisfied and pleased. Have not had the ear loops bust. They are comfortable and fit firmly around the nose with the bendable strip. Although they are durable they are breathable. And Made in the USA. Overall great product, do recommend, will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most comfortable disposable mask I've worn!
reviews.reviewText: These masks are great. The inside layer is SO soft. Most other disposable masks cause facial irritation and I'm constantly reminded I'm wearing a mask. After just a short time my face is usually raw feeling but not with these masks! I wore this mask through the airport and on a flight and honestly forgot I even had it on. The loops are a little big for my face but it's easily fixed by tying a knot in the ear loops. This will forever be the mask I go to when I need one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality product and a good value!
reviews.reviewText: These masks are of good quality and are comfortable. The only downside with them is that they are a little large which results in a gap on the sides and could lead to leakage. Otherwise a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These masks have a very quality feel to them. They seem thicker than so many others but not flimsy or cheap. They are comfortable and the ear loops are not irritating. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and I like the four layers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We used this mask to protect from dust or unwanted smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't fit fully wide on the sides, smells weird - I wouldn't recommend it.
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love these masks. I'd been given 5 black masks from someone who's mother was a health practitioner. I loved them! I thought these would be the same? They're not! I don't like the smell of the interior when putting it on. The sides seem to allow my breath to escape which to me makes no sense if I can feel air coming out upon exhaling? I've found some other masks that also do the same, I've used 2 masks to double up so this wouldn't occur? But these are too thick to use 2 masks at the same time. I really don't like these masks. I wish I could have my money back and just buy another black mask hoping it's the same kind I was given previously or just get the KN95's. I was just happy to buy something that was American Made. I'd heard some rumors about certain Chinese masks being shown to cause cancer. I'd heard the ones with the blue showing.. and so decided no matter what buy American made. But, I sincerely don't like this mask. So, I'll just need to buy something else when the time comes for some new masks. I'll figure out the best way I can use these since returning used masks aren't an option on Amazon once you've been using a product? But, I am disappointed with this product and I don't recommend it! Maybe smaller faces? I mean I hadn't considered my face large? But maybe it's the ear placement or my jaw as to why the mask doesn't fit well? The smell? That's the product so that'd be a choice? It almost smells like a wetsuit when you first begin wearing it.. the kind of smell like neoprene? It's weird.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: comfortable to wear, no fogging up that I've experienced
